t: Sell more with the New Seller Guide
s: The New Seller Guide is a set of brand, logistics, pricing, and promotional services that we recommend to sellers who are just getting started with Amazon. Brand Registry, At Content, Vine, Automate Pricing, Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), and Advertising are backed by data science and designed ...

t: Amazon Brand “Nature’s Wild Berry”: The Sales Statistics After Shark Tank Deal – Shulex VOC Blog
s: The 21st episode aired on May 5 (Season 14) had another Amazon brand, Nature’s Wild Berry. The co-founders of Nature’s Wild Berry presented many numbers in the show, grabbed a deal worth $80,000, and immediately went out of stock after airing. So, let’s explore Nature’s Wild Berry in detail in this blog, starting with an overview of the company, its deal in Shark Tank, and the analysis of its sales ...
